rows.label: tlk45710153_04_msg0001
rows.name:
You may not guess it to look at
him, but Chairman Bahn was always
very devoted to his parents.

rows.label: tlk45710153_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Yes, he definitely had a big
heart. He used to say he took
after his father in that regard.

rows.label: tlk45710153_04_msg0003
rows.name:
But I can't deny he was unhealthily
attached to money. He should have
known it would be his undoing...

rows.label: tlk45710153_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Meanwhile, look at me! Now
I've used up all my savings,
I'm unemployed and penniless!

rows.label: tlk45710153_04_msg0005
rows.name:
It's tough to find work in Alba Margen
when you're used to the Avaritia way of
doing things. Should I head back...?
